title: How to See Your Comments on YouTube

steps.title: Open the YouTube app on your phone or tablet.
steps.content: Open the YouTube app on your phone or tablet. Look for a white triangle inside a red rectangle on your home screen, or search "youtube" in your app menu. Tap on the icon to open the app.

steps.title: Search for a video.
steps.content: Search for a video. To do so, tap on the search icon in the top right corner of the screen, type your query, and then tap the search icon on your keyboard to view matching search results.

steps.title: Tap on a video in the search results.
steps.content: Tap on a video in the search results. The video will begin to play.

steps.title: Tap Comments to see comments.
steps.content: Tap Comments to see comments. They will be above the "Up next" videos. A video's owner can choose to disable comments on their video. If they have done so, you will see text that comments are disabled.

steps.title: Tap on X replies to view any replies.
steps.content: Tap on X replies to view any replies. You can like, dislike, or reply to a comment.

steps.title: Go to https://www.youtube.com in a web browser on your computer.
steps.content: Go to https://www.youtube.com in a web browser on your computer. You can use any browser on your computer to access YouTube.

steps.title: Search for a video.
steps.content: Search for a video. To do so, just type what you're looking for into the search bar at the top of the page, and then press the Enter or Return key on the keyboard. A list of search results will appear. Alternatively, navigate to a link for a video that has been shared with you.

steps.title: Click a video in the search results.
steps.content: Click a video in the search results. This opens the video's homepage, which is where you'll find the comments.

steps.title: Scroll down the video's page to see comments.
steps.content: Scroll down the video's page to see comments. They will be below the description. A video's owner can choose to disable comments on their video. If they have done so, you will see text that comments are disabled.

steps.title: Click the down-arrow on a comment to view replies.
steps.content: Click the down-arrow on a comment to view replies. You can like, dislike, or reply to a comment.

steps.title: Go to https://www.youtube.com in a web browser on your computer.
steps.content: Go to https://www.youtube.com in a web browser on your computer. You can use any browser on your computer to access YouTube.

steps.title: Click on the 3 horizontal lines ☰.
steps.content: Click on the 3 horizontal lines ☰ . It's at the top-left corner of the page. A menu will expand on the left side of the page. You can skip this step if you already see a menu with links like Home, Trending, and Subscriptions on the left side of the page.

steps.title: Click History on the menu.
steps.content: Click History on the menu. It's near the top of the menu on the left side of the page.

steps.title: Select Comments on the right panel.
steps.content: Select Comments on the right panel. It's under the "History Type" header. Comments that you've made on past videos will appear on the left.

steps.title: Click on a comment to go to the video.
steps.content: Click on a comment to go to the video. Your comment will be highlighted on top.
